snippet: PBS offers a documentary about Daisy Bates, president of the Arkansas N.A.A.C.P. and the woman behind the 1957 integration struggle at Central High School
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews Sharon La Cruise documentary Daisy Bates: First Lady of Little Rock, which will premiere on PBS's Independent Lens series.
lead_paragraph: PBS offers a documentary about Daisy Bates, president of the Arkansas N.A.A.C.P. and the woman behind the 1957 integration struggle at Central High School

headline.seo: Daisy Bates of N.A.A.C.P. Recalled on PBS - Review
